info.description: OncoKB, a comprehensive and curated precision oncology knowledge base, offers oncologists detailed, evidence-based information about individual somatic mutations and structural alterations present in patient tumors with the goal of supporting optimal treatment decisions.
info.title: OncoKB APIs

get.description: Find NCIT matches based on blur query. This is not for search OncoKB curated drugs. Please use drugs/lookup for that purpose.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query, it could be drug name, NCIT code

get.description: Search to find treatments.

parameters.name: gene
parameters.description: The search query, it could be hugoSymbol or entrezGeneId.

get.description: Find matches based on blur query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query, it could be hugoSymbol, entrezGeneId or variant.

get.description: Get annotated variants information for specified gene.
Get list of variant clinical information for specified gene.

Determine whether variant is hotspot mutation.
Check if the genomic example will be mapped to OncoKB variant.

post.description: Check which OncoKB variants can be mapped on genomic examples.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of queries. Please see swagger.json for request body format.

get.description: Get gene related numbers

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation.

get.description: Get gene related numbers of all genes. This is for main page word cloud.
